dt: {bc}of, relating to, or of the nature of a {d_link|consul|consul} or a consul's office or duties

dt.t: A lot of his {wi}consular{/wi} work involves issuing visas to Americans bound for the Alps—and Hitz happens to run a travel agency.
In Cicero's day, {wi}consular{/wi} hopefuls behaved as politicians always have and forever will.

shortdef: of, relating to, or of the nature of a consul or a consul's office or duties
